channel.title: All All Posts - The Expat Tech
channel.description: All All Posts | The Expat Tech

item.title: Tech Tips
item.author: ZDevilInside
item.description: I have been working in comptuers for a number of years and have come to the point where I don’t really see nothing anymore I haven’t seen previously in one form or another. I am going to provide tips about things I have learned and how-to’s to do various things in this area. I hope the “grey beards” I know will help me with providing information to be shared with others here.

item.title: Digital Nomad
item.author: ZDevilInside
item.description: I may not know much about how to get an online job, I can give you information on my experiences. I know how to do things that are technical in nature to help you with your nomad experience. I won’t help you get a job, get around rules/regulations of places you want to visit, but I WILL share with you what I know how to do to make this an easier experience. Things such as how to setup a Digital Nomad VPN using Wireguard is one such thing. It is actually quite easy to do. Unfortunately, I do not have the technical background to answer questions on how to fix it but will share knowledge as I learn it.

item.title: Aviation
item.author: ZDevilInside
item.description:
I have been a fan of aviation for quite some tiome. I remember reading all I could about various airplanes growing up. When I was in AFJROTC as a freshman in high school, I started to memorize performance characteristics and dreamed of being a pilot. I learned as much as I could about flying and went up every time I could.

When I went off to boarding military school, there was an aviation program there where you could learn to fly. I took lessons there and in the mountains near home when I was on break from school. I learned so much about aviation that I am wanting to share my knowledge with you. I will be starting off with lists about my favorite planes, some of their performance specifications that I feel are interesting, and will end with gneeral aviation stories. I hope you enjoy what I share here.

item.title: Living In Mexico
item.author: ZDevilInside
item.description: This is about my life’s experience with moving to Mexico and living there since August 2015.
